title: Order Splatana Replica
paragraphs: The Order Splatana Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is a reskin of the Splatana Stamper.
The Order Splatana Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Splatana Stamper, containing only white and gray colors.
The Order Splatana Replica comes with Burst Bombs and Zipcaster. The Order Splatana Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Splatana Stamper.
To unlock the Order Splatana Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Frye's Palette.
For competitive tips about the Order Splatana Replica
Note: The strategy advice for Splatana Stamper also applies to Order Splatana Replica, because of this, they share the same strategy page.

- 4.1 Translation notes
- The Order Splatana Replica is a middleweight weapon.
- The matchmaking range is 16.5. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.
- The Order Splatana Replica fires projectiles as it swings.
- The Order Splatana Replica can lunge forward if the user performs a charge slash while moving forward on the ground.
- The Order Splatana Replica cannot store its charge.
- The ink consumption of 5.2% per slash allows the user to slash 19 times per ink tank.
- After slashing, there is a 40 frame cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.
- While slashing, the user's speed is set to 0.06 units per frame.
- The projectile of the slash deals 35 damage, and the blade itself deals 20 damage, for a combined total of 55 damage.

- The projectile hitbox consists of 5 smaller hitboxes that become larger the closer they are to the center of the projectile. The center hitbox has a radius of 0.3 units, and the edge hitboxes have a radius of 0.25 units. The hitboxes cover a total width of 2.5 units.
- The projectile travels at 2.82 units per frame for 6 frames and spawns 1.4 units in front of the user, combining for a total distance of 18.62 units.
- The blade hitbox extends about 3.5 units in front of the user, and about 1.6 units to either side of the user.
- The time between continuous slashes is 26 frames.
- The user can submerge in ink 22 frames after the slash starts.
- The blade hitbox appears 6 frames after the slash starts, and the projectile appears 9 frames after the slash starts.
- The ink consumption of 11.7% per slash allows the user to slash 8 times per ink tank.
- After slashing, there is a 40 frame cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.
- While charging or slashing, the user's speed is set to 0.06 units per frame.
- The projectile of the slash deals 70 damage, and the blade itself deals 140 damage, for a combined total of 210 damage.

- The projectile hitbox consists of 7 smaller hitboxes that become larger the closer they are to the center of the projectile. The center hitbox has a radius of 0.5 units, and the edge hitboxes have a radius of 0.3 units. The hitboxes cover a total height of 3.8 units.
- The projectile travels at 0.8 units per frame for 26 frames and spawns 0.8 units in front of the user, combining for a total distance of 22.1 units.
- The blade hitbox extends about 4 units in front of the user, and about 0.5 units to either side of the user.

- It takes 20 frames to fully charge the weapon.
If the user is out of ink, then it takes 60 frames to fully charge the weapon.
- The swing animation lasts for 22 frames.
- The user can submerge in ink 14 frames after the slash starts.
- The blade hitbox appears 3 frames after the slash starts, and the projectile appears 6 frames after the slash starts.
- Lunges cover a distance of 3.0 units.

- After 3 frames of startup, the lunge lasts for 8 frames. The blade hitbox appears after 15 frames, and the projectile appears after 18 frames.
The total animation lasts for 30 frames, after which the weapon can be used again.
The user can submerge in ink 25 frames after the animation starts.
- If the user is out of ink, then it takes 60 frames to fully charge the weapon.
- The total animation lasts for 30 frames, after which the weapon can be used again.
- The user can submerge in ink 25 frames after the animation starts.
